◆ CalculateGripperParameterFromDesiredAirgap()

float ba_helper::CalculateGripperParameterFromDesiredAirgap ( float  airgap)

linearisation for gripper command --> calculates msg payload to be published to gripper controller from airgap [m] you want the gripper to open

Parameters
airgapDesired opening of the gripper in [m]
Returns
float value to publish to gripper controller for danfoa 140 2f robotiq

float ba_helper::ConvertQuaternionToAngle ( geometry_msgs::Quaternion  quat)

Converts a quaternion into an angle, based on the function: Theta = 2*atan2(sqrt(x^2+y^2+z^2), w)
